title: Problems wit Quick Casting with Indicator
body: If I right click it doesnt cancel it, I have to slowly let go of Shift then the ability. I have it so that I press shift and one of the abilities shows the indicator, and usually if you right click it cancels it, but for some reason it wont work like that on my account. Help please.

replies.body:
It should work without having to let go, so  something could be wrong with your configuration settings.  Try a config reset and let me know if that helps:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
doesnt work, i did everything oyu said.
Thanks for trying!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this with you directly.  See you there!
